definition.name: NXaberration
definition.doc: Quantified aberration coefficient in an aberration_model.

field.name: uncertainty
field.doc: Uncertainty of the value of the aberration coefficient according to uncertainty_model.

field.name: uncertainty_model
field.doc: How was the uncertainty quantified e.g. via the 95% confidence interval and using which algorithm or statistical model.

field.name: delta_time
field.doc: Time elapsed since the last measurement.

field.name: angle
field.doc: For the CEOS definitions the C aberrations are radial-symmetric and have no angle entry, while the A, B, D, S, or R aberrations are n-fold symmetric and have an angle entry. For the NION definitions the coordinate system differs to the one used in CEOS and instead two aberration coefficients a and b are used.

field.name: alias
field.doc: Alias also used to name and refer to this specific type of aberration.
